item.title: A bit About Myself
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi there! I’m Barshan, an aspiring cybersecurity enthusiast and a proactive learner, passionate about leveraging technology for positive change. Currently pursuing a 4-year B.Tech degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Amritapuri.
